name: Best Buddies In: Corporate Espionage
description:
Best Buddies in Corporate Espionage is a Buddymon fangame created by LionOhDay. In this game you will play an up and coming journalist named Rosangela investigating the biggest company in Orelon, Deucalion. However the security at their main office is tight and you will need to overcome a variety of obstacles to get the intel you seek, and worst of all is that you will only have twenty one minutes to do it! However at your disposal are creatures known as Buddymon friendly monsters who can help you on your mission to expose whatever secrets Deucalion is hiding.

 This game was created with permission from Buddyverse Studios please support the official release.
